Translation.String: Enable Harmony patches to apply system optimizations such as log suppression
Fixes performance issues in RenderIt MOD. Optimizes heavy frame processing and caches mod enablement checks
Analyzes RenderManager performance. Patches LateUpdate methods to measure detailed execution times and identify optimization opportunities (FPS Booster MOD compatible)
Runs performance and simulation analysis for 5 minutes. Generates detailed CSV reports. CPU usage will temporarily increase
Manually stops running analysis. Normally auto-stops after 5 minutes, but can be stopped early if needed
Enable frame timing measurement to monitor overall performance
Copies enabled MOD list in 'WorkshopID ModName' format to clipboard. Useful for support requests
Exports userGameState.cgs file content as JSON to clipboard. Used for detailed analysis of the 2.6MB file
Exports summary information (size, path, status) of all settings files as JSON to clipboard

About Performance Analysis

This function executes heavy processing:
• Measures execution time of all methods
• Runs continuously for 5 minutes
• May cause temporary FPS drops

⭐ Recommendations:
• Save your game before starting
• Avoid important city operations
• Will automatically stop after 5 minutes

Do you want to continue?
RECOMMENDATION: Please save your game now for safety!
Analysis will run for 5 minutes and auto-stop
